太陽は知らない 月には届かない\r\n: The sun doesn't know, it can't reach the moon
ざわめく人ごみのまとわりつく温度\r\n: The clinging warmth of the bustling crowd
遠雷に似た合図が響く\r\n: A signal resembling distant thunder resounds
逸る想いと呼び合うように\r\n: As if calling out to each other's impatient feelings
感じさせてよ もっと 愛を\r\n: Let me feel it, more love
暗闇に咲く葛藤と見つめ合っていたい\r\n: I want to gaze into the conflicts blooming in the darkness
沈黙を破って降りそそぐたび\r\n: Every time it breaks the silence and pours down
あぁ もう少し浮かされていたいな\r\n: Ah, I want to float a little longer
息を呑んで そらさないで\r\n: Hold your breath, don't look away
忘れたくない繚乱の高揚を\r\n: I don't want to forget this extravagant exhilaration
